resources.string: Option 1: Go to Settings - Security - Privilege Management Program - FangCloud - Audio Recoding, and set as allow;
Option 2: Go to 360 Safe Guard - Security Protection - Privacy Behavior Monitoring - Privacy Rights Management - FangCloud - Audio Recording, and set as allow;
Option 3: Please find FangCloud and set the permission of audio recording to allow if you have any other permission management tools.
